name: struct2grvtx
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))
-| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))

stmt.origin: structvtxval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
stmt.pretty: structvtxval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (.ef ` ndx))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))
-| wcel(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cn)
-| wbr(cfv(cbs, cnx), clt, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
-| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(Vtx ` c4)= c0)
⊣ (.ef ` ndx)∈ ℕ
⊣ (Base ` ndx)[<](.ef ` ndx)
⊣ c4 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(.ef ` ndx), c2 > }

cumulated.origin:

-| wcel(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cn)
-| wbr(cfv(cbs, cnx), clt, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
-| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(Vtx ` c4)= c0)
⊣ (.ef ` ndx)∈ ℕ
⊣ (Base ` ndx)[<](.ef ` ndx)
⊣ c4 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(.ef ` ndx), c2 > }

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))

-| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))
-| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))

comment: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an extensible structure with vertices as base set and indexed edges. (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.)
